original_text: I will take note of you as you pass under my rod, and I will bring you into the bond of the covenant.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 막대기 아래로 지나가게 하며 언약의 줄로 매려니와

sentences.original_text: I will take note of you
as you pass under my rod
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 지팡이 아래로 지나갈 때

sentences.original_text: into the bond of the covenant
